scripts.build: echo 'Building web-app with Bun...' && sleep 4 && echo 'web-app build complete!'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting web-app dev server with Bun...' && while true; do echo '[web-app] Dev server running on port 3000...'; sleep 3; done
scripts.test: echo 'Running web-app tests with Bun...' && sleep 2 && echo 'web-app tests passed!'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting web-app with Bun...' && sleep 1 && echo 'web-app linting complete!'
scripts.start: echo 'Starting web-app production server with Bun...' && echo 'web-app running on port 3000'
